channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 11:11 pm alarm to the Odesa region.Creat on further messages.
item.description: 游릭 11:11 pm alarm to the Odesa region.Creat on further messages.#Odessa This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
